testsuite.name: CinemaTests

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #3
The second line of the seating arrangement should contain 'B' symbol.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter the number of rows: > 7 Enter the number of seats in each row: > 8 1. Show the seats 2. Buy a ticket 0. Exit > 2 Enter a row number: > 2 Enter a seat number in that row: > 4 Ticket price: $10 1. Show the seats 2. Buy a ticket 0. Exit > 1 Cinema: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 1 S S S S S S S S 2 S S S S S S S S 3 S S S S S S S S 4 S S S S S S S S 5 S S S S S S S S 6 S S S S S S S S 7 S S S S S S S S 1. Show the seats 2. Buy a ticket 0. Exit
